org.ggp.base.util.game

Class RemoteGameRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ggp.base.util.game.GameRepository
      • org.ggp.base.util.game.RemoteGameRepository

  • public final class RemoteGameRepository
extends GameRepository
    Remote game repositories provide access to game resources stored on game repository servers on the web. These require a network connection to work.
